author: jacques
msg: update links to include alpha release download and updated hangout link

author: rvesse
msg: Add support for configuring User-Agent header via HttpOp, set a sensible default value for general usage (JENA-572)

author: jukka
msg: Special case references to the same segment, to reduce the overhead of
storing and accessing the majority of record identifiers.

author: jukka
msg: Inline the list of identifiers of referenced segments into the
segment byte sequence. This avoids the need to keep the identifiers
in memory when they're not being accessed.
